articles.author: Karin Abcarians
articles.title: LeBron James’ tip-in at buzzer snaps Lakers losing streka - Silver Screen and Roll
articles.description: The Lakers survived a wild game in Indianapolis with a tip-in at the buzzer form LeBron James to beat the Pacers
articles.content: Luka Doncic came up big in the fourth quarter, but it was a LeBron James tip-in as time expired that saw the Lakers snap their losing streak in Indianapolis on Wednesday, knocking off the Pacers, 120… [+4770 chars]
